title: Not Getting Mastery 7 token
body: I have two or three games recently with a grade S on Jayce but I didnt get any mastery 7 Token, anyone have same problem?>

replies.body: If the matches were played on Summoner's Rift, another possibility might be that you earned an S-. S- grades will not reward you with a mastery 7 token, only S or S+ grades do.
Was this on a Summoner's Rift match? Normals and Ranked on SR are the only matches eligible to earn mastery tokens on.
